title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000 

(Section 181(2)(a)) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2000 (section 181(2)(a)) order 2024

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) (other than
text_raw:
2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) (other than 
sections 50, 50A, 50B and 181 of that Act) shall not apply to the development 
described in Part 1 of the Schedule proposed to be carried out by me or on my 
behalf.
text_norm: 2 planning development act 2000 (no 30 2000) (other section 50 50a 50b 181 act) shall apply development described part 1 schedule proposed carried behalf

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 3. This Order shall cease to have effect on the date that is the fifth
text_raw:
3. This Order shall cease to have effect on the date that is the fifth 

anniversary of the date on which this Order comes into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [365]
text_norm: 3 order shall cease effect date fifth anniversary date order come operation 4 365

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 2.4m high security fencing, external lighting, CCTV surveillance
text_raw:
2.4m high security fencing, external lighting, CCTV surveillance 
system, pipework, storage facilities, electrical distribution boxes 
for the purposes of accommodating applicants within the meaning 
(Receptions Conditions) 
of 
Regulations 2018 (S.I. 230 of 2018) to include: 

the European Communities

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: The development works will replace current tented accommodation
text_raw:
3. 

The development works will replace current tented accommodation 
with 45 modular units. 

The external dimensions of the modular units will be 7.344M x 6.058M 
x 2.9M high.
text_norm: 3 development work replace current tented accommodation 45 modular unit external dimension modular unit 7.344m x 6.058m x 2.9m high

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: The provision of sanitary and shower facilities.
text_raw:
4. 

The provision of sanitary and shower facilities.

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 5. All proposed sanitary modules to be connected to the existing mains
text_raw:
5. All proposed sanitary modules to be connected to the existing mains 

sewage system on site.
text_norm: 5 proposed sanitary module connected existing main sewage system site

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: Provision and storage of hot and cold water for sanitary facilities.
text_raw:
9. 

Provision and storage of hot and cold water for sanitary facilities. 

The external general/amenity areas are to be provided with security 
fencing, adequate external lighting and also protected by a certified 
external CCTV surveillance system. 

The provision of suitable and adequate pest and vermin proof refuse 
storage facilities. 

The installations for the supply of gas (LPG), oil and electricity 
including pipework, storage facilities and electrical distribution boxes 
including pipework, storage facilities and electrical distribution boxes 
and any necessary ancillary works required in relation to same.
text_norm: 9 provision storage hot cold water sanitary facility external general amenity area provided security fencing adequate external lighting also protected certified external cctv surveillance system provision suitable adequate pest vermin proof refuse storage facility installation supply gas (lpg) oil electricity including pipework storage facility electrical distribution box including pipework storage facility electrical distribution box necessary ancillary work required relation same

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 10. The site perimeter to be enclosed/secured with 1.8m to 2.4m high
text_raw:
10. The site perimeter to be enclosed/secured with 1.8m to 2.4m high 
security fencing and the external general/amenity areas to be provided 
with adequate external lighting and also protected by a certified external 
CCTV surveillance system.
text_norm: 10 site perimeter enclosed secured 1.8m 2.4m high security fencing external general amenity area provided adequate external lighting also protected certified external cctv surveillance system

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 11. Such further and other ancillary works, to include site development
text_raw:
11. Such further and other ancillary works, to include site development 
works and landscaping, to facilitate the above works as may be 
required. 

 
 
 
 The detail of the site boundary is as set out in the map in Part 2 of this 
schedule. 

[365] 5 

Part 2 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [365] 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 July, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth.
